Slash.description:
†: 20
acc: 0.80
Require skill
to start your
journey.
Slash.effect:
player.battle_info=['Using Slash']
if random.random() < 0.8:
    enemy_hp_before_skill = enemy.hp
    enemy.hp -= int(player.levels * 1.2 + 20)
    player.battle_info.append(f'{enemy.name} take {enemy_hp_before_skill-enemy.hp} damage\nto HP')
else:
    player.battle_info.append(f'{enemy.name} have dodge\nyour attack')

Punch.effect:
player.battle_info=['Using Punch']
enemy_hp_before_skill = enemy.hp
enemy.hp -= int(player.levels * 1.2 + 5)
player.battle_info.append(f'{enemy.name} take {enemy_hp_before_skill-enemy.hp} damage\nto HP')
